entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Havre St-Pierre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Havre-Saint-Pierre Airport 06:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -9.8°C
Pressure: 103.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -16.6°C
Wind: NE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or freezing rain. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon then changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain after midnight. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
